summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.4°C), outside temperature (down 6.2°C), and inside temperature (down 1.9°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 6%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles) and light levels (up 5150 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and mostly calm with light air movement. Chance of light rain, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and bright intervals likely. Similar weather conditions should remain.
